评论详情: Simply beautiful!!!! Loooooved these dresses! My daughters and I wore these dresses for a sweet 16 and we looked absolutely stunning. We had so many compliments. They were true to size, the fabric weight and material thickness were perfect! Would definitely recommend!

I absolutely loved this dress, it was the perfect length! So so comfortable the fabric wasnt itchy at all. It was very lightweight and really good quality. The price is well worth it especially if you wait last minute like i did for a dress. I was a bridesmaid in may and this dress was so perfect and the color is to die for!!😍😍 love love love!!

I absolutely loved this dress!! We used this dress as part of our Simple Romantic theme for Family Pictures. I love the dimension of the leg slit, ruffles of the top, light flowy material from the shoulders to the bottom of the dress, appearance of an empire waist, and the bold color. The shoulders are versatile so you can wear them on the shoulder or off-shoulder. I like that the design was made to look bunched in the bust which helped keep it secure and form fitting while leaning over. I felt the dress was flattering with the loose & flowy material with the texture up top to hide any unwanted flaws. The slit is a bit high so I wore neutral spanks in case the wind blew it open. Dress was soft and comfortable; wrinkles came out easily with a steamer. Make sure to wash separately as the color bled quite a bit in the washer, but the dress remained unfazed. It was durable enough for me to snag a heel on it a couple of times going up the stairs. I wish the price point was a little less expensive, but overall I loved this dress in our pictures!
This dress was so comfy, great price and perfect for a black tie wedding!
Cute and comfortable! Perfect fall engagement photo dress.
love it!

I absolutely love this dress. The color and the fit is fabulous.The style is stunning. Unfortunately my dress came dirty. I will be returning the dress. I did order a replacement dress. Hopefully it will get here before the wedding.
Great dress and quality! Sage was perfect! Wore it as a bridesmaid dress

I am about 6 months pregnant, the size 10 fit great. I’m 5’6” 180lbs, and normally wear an 8/10 L. This dress fit great, just needed a nice steam. I also got it in a size 12, but didn’t need the size up. The sleeves stayed in place, and the slit wasn’t too high or revealing.
Fit as described, beautiful dress and super comfortable! Loved it!

wore this to my brother's wedding and received a lot of compliments and people asking where I had gotten it, they were shocked to learn I got it from amazon especially at such a great price, highly recommend. it is a bit longer if you're shorter (I'm 5'4") and can get caught on your feet so make sure to wear heels and you'll be fine
The dress looks just like the picture and fit true to size!

This dress truly saved the day. I've never had a harder time finding a formal gown - and I am in formalwear constantly. This dress was I think the 6th or 7th I ordered and it is PERFECT. So comfortable, I would wear it to Thanksgiving dinner. The sheer overlay is lovely and the slit adds so much shape and movement to the dress. I'd give it ten stars if I could!

This dress fit true to size - we followed the guide.  Light and flowy fabric.  Good construction.  It arrived within 10 days.  My daughter loves it!

评论概述: Weirdest Sleeve Situation I've Ever Seen
评论详情: I really wanted to love this dress - - and maybe it's a skill issue - - but there is NO good way to get these sleeves to be where you want them to be. It's marketed as being adjustable, but the way they do this in practice is by making one of the shoulders VERY elasticized and the other not at all. The "off the shoulder" look is uh...dangerous on one side, and there's no way to get the two sleeves to match, and I have no idea how you'd wear this sleeveless or with both sleeves up and still have it look nice. On second glance the pictures do show the difference in the sleeves, but there's no good way to see it clearly. The rest of the fit was just as expected, the color and the materials are fine, but the sleeves are a puzzle I could not solve.
Love this dress
Material makes fit perfect, slightly stretchy. Very happy with this purchase.

Definitely doesn’t look like a dress I bought from Amazon. I have a big bust and short torso and evening gowns are difficult for me to fit into, this one is great! I am going to try one size smaller but this one does work. It’s a little long (I’m 5’3”) so I’m hoping the smaller size might help. But otherwise I’m thrilled with it!

I love the way this dress fits so much that I’ve bought 3 colors. It’s very flattering, comfortable, and perfect for a formal dress. The dress stays up well and the fabrics feels nice. I am a bit of a perfectionist and went a little crazy with the ironing, but it was so worth it. If you don’t want to iron it, it will have some wrinkles but still looks beautiful. I was able to use a cheap handheld steamer to get the biggest wrinkles out but an iron worked best. I want a short dress in this style and more fabric options because I just love the cut and fit of it. I think it would also work well for bigger chests because I definitely had some room with a C/D cup. It stayed up and looked great both with a push up bra and braless even with me sizing up for a looser fit. I like that the arms are comfy and don’t dig in like some off the shoulder styles can. The colors look just like the picture and I got the light blue, light green, and black. I wore the light colors to weddings and was drinking and dancing a lot at both with no issues. I haven’t had the opportunity to wear the black one yet but I have a feeling it might be my favorite 😁

This is a beautiful dress. I definitely feel like the lilac color is a little more purple pink than the lighter purple if that makes sense other than that qualities nice you can wear it on your shoulders or actually wear the straps which is super cute.
This was the perfect wedding reception dress. It fit beautifully, was easy to clean, great quality for price!

I got married in this dress and it was sooooo beautiful. It's not too clear but I wore skin tone panties to be safe. I got many compliments on how it fit. If you're a person who carries weight in the "trunk" like me, it will definitely accentuate your assets 😊
I absolutely love this dress! It is good quality and material and accurate to size. Wore this for engagement pictures.
I got this for a bridesmaid dress and it is no different than the quality of a similar dress for $150-$250!
The fit was PERFECT!!! The way the dress flowed.
The fit is larger than expected so I would get a size down. But it was a great fabric, comfortable, and elastic! I used it for a bridesmaid dress!
Utilizare este vestido para dama de honor en una boda El color la talla todo perfecto la tela. Me encanto.
Wore this to a wedding 7/8m pregnant and it worked great! Went up a size and it was comfortable. I’m 5’9” and with flats it hit the ground perfectly

Such an amazing dress with quality fabric. Perfect for a bridesmaid dress and great for every body type.  The flowy sleeves cover that area of your arms you might be self conscious of. I just wore to a black tie wedding and got compliments and felt so sexy (leg slit) and comfortable at the same time.  I will be buying in another color for my next wedding. I’m 5”1 so the length was a little much for me, but I held the bottom while I was walking. I might hem for next use. 10 stars!  Reference: 5”1, 34DD, 8-10
This dress was just what I needed for a formal occasion! It is very flattering and fit perfectly. The fabric looks very nice and is thicker than I expected (in a good way).

I bought this dress to wear to a wedding. When I received it, I hung it up in my closet. I noticed a burnt plastic smell in the closet. When I took the dress out, I noticed that the top part of the dress had the pungent smell. I hung it to air out in an open space and the smell permeated the whole hallway even with windows open! I washed the dress and it still smelled. I washed it again with vinegar and detergent and it was better. Washing it for a third time now to see if it can at least smell of the laundry detergent rather than vinegar! Such a shame as I love the fit, colour and style. Not living in the US, it would have been much more troublesome to return! Hoping that this does the trick and I can wear it to the wedding without the stench!

I can’t believe this is happening. Wearing it right now and the left sleeve snapped and broke!! The stretchy string that holds it together completely broke so now the ruffle sleeve no longer stays up. It’s just hanging low on the side of my arm. Looks ridiculous. This ruined my day. How am I supposed to wear this to the wedding now?! Absolutely 100% returning! Thanks a lot.

The dress was okay. It came in a bag so it was wrinkled. It was too long and the slit was way too high. I ended having to get it altered so I spent more on alterations and having it ironed at the cleaners, than what the dress cost.

Pretty but not as formal as expected. Material picks up everything so spotted with marks before event
I bought this for my wedding on the beach.  Was better than anything I saw at any of the stores.  Loved the fit loved the split loved everything about it.

Purchased this dress as a backup for my daughter’s prom in case the more formal one didn’t arrive on time. She did receive it in time, and ultimately decided on this dress instead. Classy, flattering, comfortable and perfect fit. Love the high slit and super easy to move around/dance in. Got tons of compliments. Fantastic dress!

评论概述: Beautiful but a little large on me
评论详情: It’s lined and good quality! Beautiful color. My issue was it was a little big on top.  I got the size 24. I’m 225 lbs, with 40 DDD US, 42.5 inch waist.  I would have preferred one size smaller for the waist and bust.
The dress was a performance length, loved the color, the fabric. The dress had a slight stretch to it, which was great. I received tons of compliments on it. Also the shoulder straps stayed down.

I bought this for a work banquet. I ordered it on Tuesday and it arrived by Thursday so that I had it for Saturday! The dress is true to size. I am 5’3 and wear a size 14-16. I bought a 14 and it fit perfectly. The bust area doesn’t have really any stretch so if you’re busty, might need to size up. I am smaller in the chest. The material really sucks you in - I didn’t even need shape wear. Length was perfect I wore 3.5 inch heels and had no issues. Even without shoes the dress didn’t drag on the floor. I’m going to buy another color for when I’m a bridesmaid.
Great quality for money Flattering and easy to wear
Dress was very nice but wasn't flattering on me at all.

Fit is true to size. Very nice material. Dress is as pictured. Looks amazing on my daughter. She is wearing it as a maid of honor dress. She is 5'7 and the length is perfect with heels. Would recommend for sure!
Lovely dress. Too simple by itself, but I decorated the navy dress with gold accessories and it’s darling. Definitely recommend

I was having trouble finding a formal long dress since I am tall. I am 6ft and wear a size 12 and have an athletic build. This dress is so flattering and hits the floor with no shoes on. I ordered an XL and fits perfect.

I ordered this dress because my cousin wore the same dress in a different color for my wedding! I tried hers on and it fit perfectly! Which was over a year ago! My size I got was perfect for my fitting, love that you can wear it more than 1 way, the material feels very nice, light weight, very comfortable and goes well with almost any formal event!

Wore this to my sister’s wedding in the Dominican Republic. I received many compliments and I didn’t feel squished. I’m 5’6” ~128lbs and it was perfect with heels, a little long without. I had room to dance, it felt air-y & I loved how it fit. Really happy with this one!

评论概述: Fits and looks great. A tad tight.
评论详情: I’m 5’7”, 34DDD, 160lbs. I ordered a medium for my mother’s beach wedding. It’s long enough and fits. Doesn’t have much stretch to get on so it had to go on over my head versus stepping in. It’s very flattering and I have broader shoulders and not entirely an hourglass figure but you can’t tell with the way the dress hangs. I did have to get backless bra to organize the girls a bit better cause while it holds them secure it has very little padding so it’s it windy the day of the wedding and the top piece flies up you can see the outline of everything up top.

I love this dress so much, the fabric is beautiful! And it’s extremely comfortable. The slit fits my height just fine and it’s a little bit long but with high heels, it will be perfect. Unfortunately the wedding has been called off and I don't foresee an event that I can wear this to, but I definitely give it 5 stars.
